mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where bno>0 order by bno DESC
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, writer, title, content) values (seq_board.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updateDate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
